name: 2D Shooter Version 1
description:
This is a 2D Shooter game designed by Ryan Corsiglia.

This project is a work in progress and is not finished.

Planned Modifications:

1. Add two new levels with different music and different enemies, and even possibly different environments.

2.  Add new play abilities such as power-ups.

3. Add new enemies, obstacles, and different challenges to the two new levels.
